views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10

Group notifications by apps! Bring back the grouping of notifications from previous iOS versions. Also, easily fold sections with notifications for apps that you don't want to see banners from. Works on Lock Screen and Notification Center!

Configure options from Settings app

Update the DRM system. Bug fixes and under hood improvements Add option to sort app sections by most recent! An app section with most the recent notification will move to the top of the list. Experimental feature. By default, it's turned off.

Add option to make notifications look sleek by removing title and timestamp. By default, it's turned off.

Bug fixes and improvements.
Attempt to fix crashes that some users experience on LS or upon receiving notifications.

Add option to always hide app title in Sections.


True privacy mode on LS - collapse opened sections after screen was turned off.

Add Privacy Mode on NC.

Add option to remove section title when expanded.

Colorize sections even when icons are turned off.

Fix delimiter not being applied to LS Sections.

Fix a crash that happens after clearing a section for some users.

Update Preference Page - fix missing banner and rearrange options.
